remarks:
A Cartesian product is included in the power of the power of the union of its arguments.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2006.) 

---

 A cross product is included in the power of the power of the union of its arguments.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2006.)
statement: xpsspw $p |- ( A X. B ) C_ ~P ~P ( A u. B ) $.
